vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateDeposit.cashOut (patch_2.sol#32-38):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_2.sol#34)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_2.sol#35)
